title: Buy a UK fishing rod licence

details.description: Buy a licence to fish in England, Wales and the Border Esk in Scotland by completing an online form
details.more_information:
If you’re under 12, you don’t need a fishing rod licence in England, Wales or the Border Esk in Scotland.

Fishing in Scotland and Northern Ireland

You don’t need a fishing rod licence in Scotland, but you need permission.

You need to get either a licence or a permit to fish in Northern Ireland.
details.introduction: You can buy a licence to fish in England, Wales and the Border Esk in Scotland by completing an online form. You can choose what kind of licence you want, eg 1 day or 1 year.
details.alternate_methods:
You can call the Post Office on 0844 800 5386 to buy your fishing rod licence.

You can also buy your fishing rod licence by direct debit from the Environment Agency.
expectations: Available in England and Wales only
